segments.text: There's been a dramatic change in the weather pattern .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't tell me it affects our flight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did they say for how long ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but probably until there is a break in the storm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So we can't really go anywhere , can we ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's smart to stay close to the gate so we can hear the updates .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I brought some cards . Are you up for a long game ?
segments.speaker: S2
